Authors:
Darlan Ferreira Borges, Washington Luis da Silva, Marcia
M.Q. Ambrosio
Title:
Detection of multiple grapevine viruses in Connecticut
vineyards
Abstract:
Report for the first time the occurrence of GLRaVs and
other grape viruses in Connecticut vineyards. These results have
implications for the immediate need to implement sanitation measures to
avoid the introduction of grapevine virus diseases in CT vineyards,
which in turn will promote the sustainability of the state wine
industry.
